Class HotlineAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class HotlineAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ViewHolderHotline>
    Adapter class to Show the hotline numbers of test center who do COVID tests in the recyclerview

    Nafisa Hossain Nujat
